BusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: La Casa De Don Pedro Inc

IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: LA CASA DE DON PEDRO'S MISSION IS TO FOSTER SELF-SUFFICIENCY, EMPOWERMENT, AND NEIGHBORHOOD REVITALIZATION.
IRS990.MissionDesc: LA CASA DE DON PEDRO'S MISSION IS TO FOSTER SELF-SUFFICIENCY, EMPOWERMENT, AND NEIGHBORHOOD REVITALIZATION.
IRS990.Desc: EARLY CHILDHOOD PROGRAM - TO PROVIDE PRESCHOOL EDUCATION TO THREE AND FOUR YEAR OLD CHILDREN UNDER THE NEWARK PUBLIC SCHOOLS.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: COMMUNITY IMPROVEMENT PROGRAM - THIS PROGRAM IS PRIMARILY COMPRISED OF TWO COMPONENTS, THE LOW INCOME HOME ENERGY ASSISTANCE PROGRAM (HOME ENERGY) AND THE WEATHERIZATION ASSISTANCE PROGRAM (WEATHERIZATION). THE HOME ENERGY PROGRAM PROVIDES PAYMENT ASSISTANCE FOR INCOME ELIGIBLE INDIVIDUALS THROUGHOUT ESSEX COUNTY. THE WEATHERIZATION PROGRAM PROVIDES ASSISTANCE FOR ELIGIBLE HOMEOWNERS, LANDLORDS, AND TENANTS WITH HOME IMPROVEMENTS RELATED ENERGY CONSERVATION MEASURES.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: YOUTH AND FAMILY SERVICES PROGRAM - TO PROVIDE FAMILY COUNSELING, PARENTING AND HEALTH EDUCATION, AFTER SCHOOL AND SUMMER ENRICHMENT PROGRAMS, LEADERSHIP DEVELOPMENT, DOMESTIC VIOLENCE INTERVENTION, AND YOUTH EMPOWERMENT SERVICES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, SCHEDULE D, PART X, LINE 2
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: La Casa De Don Pedro is exempt from federal and state income taxes under Section 501(c)(3) of the Internal Revenue Code and New Jersey taxation codes. Accordingly, no provision for income taxes has been reflected in this 990. La Casa has been determined not to be a "Private Foundation" within the meaning of Section 509(a) of the Internal Revenue Code. The organization has no unrecognized tax benefits at June 30, 2018. The Organization files tax returns in the U.S. federal jurisdiction and New Jersey.

The organization maintains client records which includes an application, client consent form, proof of residency and income, as well as an eviction notice or proof of hardship in the case of housing relocation grants. The organization submits reports to the funding sources which also provide monitoring of the contract.

PERSONAL DEVELOPMENT PROGRAM - ADMINISTERS MULTI-SERVICE RESOURCE AND REFERRAL PROGRAMS PRIMARILY TARGETED AT HISPANIC WOMEN AND FAMILIES. THE PROGRAM ENGAGES PRIMARILY IN EDUCATIONAL AND EMPLOYMENT SERVICES MEANT TO ASSIST THE INDIVIDUAL TO BECOME ECONOMICALLY SELF-SUFFICIENT AND A CONTRIBUTING MEMBER OF SOCIETY. COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT PROGRAM WORKS WITH FIRST TIME HOME BUYERS TO PREPARE AND EMPOWER THEM TO MAKE SMART DECISIONS THROUGHOUT THE HOME BUYING PROCESS INCLUDING DOWNPAYMENT AND CLOSING COST ASSISTANCE PROGRAMS. THE PROGRAM ALSO HELPS FAMILIES FACING FORECLOSURE TO ASSESS THE FAMILIES NEEDS AND PROVIDE COUNSELING AS TO ANY HOUSING ASSISTANCE PROGRAMS THE FAMILY MAY BE ELIGIBLE FOR.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: The Form 990 is prepared by an outside CPA firm and reviewed by the finance office and management. BEFORE THE 990 IS FILED, THE BOARD MEMBERS RECEIVE A FINAL COPY FOR REVIEW AND HAVE A DISCUSSION AT A BOARD MEETING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZAION REQUIRES THAT ALL OFFICERS, DIRECTORS, TRUSTEES, AND KEY EMPLOYEES ANNUALLY DISCLOSE ANY CONFLICTS OF INTEREST TO THE ORGANIZATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ALL INCREASES OF THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR ARE DETERMINED BY THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD, IN CONJUNCTION WITH, THE GOVERNANCE COMMITTEE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION MAKES ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.
